text:
URL: ```POST /api/login```

Request
```javascript
{
    username: "yogsther",
    password: "testpass123"
}
```

Response success

```javascript
{
    success: true,
    me: {
        "username": "Yogsther",
        "name": "Olle K.",
        "created": null,
        "admin": null,
        "email": null,
        "avatar": null,
        "slack_id": null,
        "slack_domain": null
    }
}
```
title: POST login
